â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 4: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚   - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ ---                                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ JSON string with these fields:                                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - quotation_text: str (customer-friendly quote explanation)                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ - order_id: str (from order_details)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - items_count: int (number of items quoted)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ - quotation_items: list[dict\] (all items with pricing details)                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   **EACH ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚   - unit_price (original cost price)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   - selling_price (price after 20% markup)                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - total (selling_price Ã— quantity)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - subtotal: float (before discount)                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - discount_percent: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - discount_amount: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Set discount_amount = 0.0                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚   - Set final_total = subtotal                                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚   - Do NOT mention discount in quotation_text                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ If discount_percent > 0:                                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚   - Calculate final_total                                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ ---                                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚       - request_date (provided above)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚       - reorder_quantity (from inventory)                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 2. After ALL items are fulfilled:                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚    - Call generate_tracking_number() to get tracking number                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 3. Build response with:                                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚    - order_id: from quote_details['order_id'\]                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚    - tracking_number: from generate_tracking_number()                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚    - order_delivery_date: LATEST estimated_delivery_date from all items                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚    - total_amount: from quote_details['final_total'\]                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚    - items: list combining fulfillment results with inventory details                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CRITICAL: You MUST call fulfill_single_item_order for every item, passing ALL 7 parameters.                                                             â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚

â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚

â”‚   - Call calculate_single_item_quote with:                                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 2: After ALL items are calculated:                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_order_total with list of all item results                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚   - This gives you: total_quantity, subtotal                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 3: Calculate discount:                                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚   - This gives you: discount_percent                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 4: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚   - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                                                       â”‚

â”‚ - order_id: str (from order_details)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - items_count: int (number of items quoted)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ - quotation_items: list[dict\] (all items with pricing details)                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   **EACH ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚   - unit_price (original cost price)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   - selling_price (price after 20% markup)                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - total (selling_price Ã— quantity)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - subtotal: float (before discount)                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - discount_percent: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - discount_amount: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Set discount_amount = 0.0                                                                                                                           â”‚

â”‚   - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚   - Calculate final_total                                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                                                               â”‚

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                                                      â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ EXECUTION INSTRUCTIONS:                                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âš ï¸ PHASE 1: CALCULATIONS (DO NOT RETURN ANSWER YET)                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 1: For EACH item in order_details['query_items'\] where found=True:                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_single_item_quote with:                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚     * item_name                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     * order_quantity                                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚     * unit_price                                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚   - Store the result                                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 2: After ALL items are calculated:                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_order_total with list of all item results                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚   - This gives you: total_quantity, subtotal                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 3: Calculate discount:                                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚   - This gives you: discount_percent                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 4: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚   - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ ---                                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ JSON string with these fields:                                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - quotation_text: str (customer-friendly quote explanation)                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ - order_id: str (from order_details)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - items_count: int (number of items quoted)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ - quotation_items: list[dict\] (all items with pricing details)                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   **EACH ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚   - unit_price (original cost price)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   - selling_price (price after 20% markup)                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - total (selling_price Ã— quantity)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - subtotal: float (before discount)                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - discount_percent: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - discount_amount: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Set discount_amount = 0.0                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚   - Set final_total = subtotal                                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚   - Do NOT mention discount in quotation_text                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ If discount_percent > 0:                                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚   - Calculate final_total                                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ ---                                                                                                                                                     â”‚

â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚

â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚

â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                                                                â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                                                      â”‚

I need to order 10,000 sheets of A4 paper, 5,000 sheets of A3 paper, and 500

for our upcoming conference. Please confirm the order and delivery schedule.

================================================================================

Thank you for your order! For your upcoming conference, we have calculated
the costs for 10,000 sheets of A4 paper at $0.06 each, 5,000 sheets of A3
paper at $0.06 each, and 250,000 sheets of printer paper at $0.06 each.
Since you're ordering in bulk, I'm pleased to apply a 10% discount to your
order. This brings the A4 paper total to $600.00, the A3 paper to $300.00,
and the printer paper to $15,000.00. I've calculated your total to be
$14,310.00 including your 10% discount.

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:                                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] No escaped quotes in the outer structure                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Multi-line strings use \n not actual newlines                                                                                                     â”‚

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                                                             â”‚

â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                                                     â”‚

â”‚   - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                                                            â”‚

â”‚ Step 4: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚   - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                                                            â”‚

â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚

â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚

ORIGINAL REQUEST

I would like to place an order for 500 sheets of 8.5"x11" colored paper, 300
sheets of cardstock in various colors, and 200 rolls of decorative washi
tape. I need these supplies delivered by April 15, 2025, for an upcoming
party. Thank you!

Thank you for your order! For your upcoming party, we have calculated the
costs for 500 sheets of 8.5"x11" colored paper at $0.12 each, 300 sheets of
cardstock at $0.18 each, and 200 rolls of decorative washi tape at $0.24
each. Since you're ordering in bulk, I'm pleased to apply a 3% discount to
your order. This brings the Colored paper total to $60.00, the Cardstock
total to $54.00, and the Decorative washi tape to $48.00. I've calculated
your total to be $156.00 including your 3% discount.

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚ search query term, closest matches of item name, order quantities, categories, sizes, additional notes, unit prices, sources, and whether the item was  â”‚
â”‚ found. Return your response as a JSON string.                                                                                                           â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 1: For EACH item in order_details['query_items'\] where found=True:                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_single_item_quote with:                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚     * item_name                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚   - Store the result                                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 2: After ALL items are calculated:                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_order_total with list of all item results                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚   - This gives you: total_quantity, subtotal                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 3: Calculate discount:                                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚   - This gives you: discount_percent                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Step 4: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚   - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ ---                                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ JSON string with these fields:                                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - quotation_text: str (customer-friendly quote explanation)                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ - order_id: str (from order_details)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - items_count: int (number of items quoted)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ - quotation_items: list[dict\] (all items with pricing details)                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   **EACH ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚   - unit_price (original cost price)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   - selling_price (price after 20% markup)                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚   - total (selling_price Ã— quantity)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ - subtotal: float (before discount)                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - discount_percent: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - discount_amount: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Set discount_amount = 0.0                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚   - Set final_total = subtotal                                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚   - Do NOT mention discount in quotation_text                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ If discount_percent > 0:                                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚   - Calculate final_total                                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚

â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:                                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] No escaped quotes in the outer structure                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Multi-line strings use \n not actual newlines                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All JSON keys are strings                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Proper comma placement                                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Valid JSON syntax throughout                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ Your response will be parsed directly with json.loads() - ensure it's valid!                                                                            â”‚

Response: ================================================================================
MUNDER DIFFLIN PAPER SUPPLY COMPANY
Order Confirmation
================================================================================

Order ID: ORD_AC816EBB
Order Date: April 06, 2025
Customer: School Teacher
Event Type: Assembly

================================================================================
ORIGINAL REQUEST
================================================================================

I would like to order 500 sheets of colorful construction paper, 300 sheets
of white printer paper, and 200 sheets of cardstock in various colors. We
need these supplies delivered by April 15, 2025, for our upcoming assembly.

================================================================================
QUOTATION SUMMARY
================================================================================

Thank you for your order! For your upcoming festival, we have calculated the
costs for 300 sheets of A4 paper at $0.06 each, 500 sheets of construction
paper at $0.08 each, and 200 sheets of cardstock at $0.18 each. Since you're
ordering in bulk, I'm pleased to apply a 3% discount to your order. This
brings the A4 paper total to $18.00, the cardstock total to $36.00, and the
construction paper to $42.00. Ive calculated your total to be $93.12
including your 3% discount.

â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚

â”‚ Step 4: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚   - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚   - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                                                       â”‚

â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚

â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:                                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] No escaped quotes in the outer structure                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Multi-line strings use \n not actual newlines                                                                                                     â”‚

â”‚       - reorder_quantity (from inventory)                                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 2. After ALL items are fulfilled:                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚    - Call generate_tracking_number() to get tracking number                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 3. Build response with:                                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚    - order_id: from quote_details['order_id'\]                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚    - tracking_number: from generate_tracking_number()                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚    - order_delivery_date: LATEST estimated_delivery_date from all items                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚    - total_amount: from quote_details['final_total'\]                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚    - items: list combining fulfillment results with inventory details                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CRITICAL: You MUST call fulfill_single_item_order for every item, passing ALL 7 parameters.                                                             â”‚

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                                                           â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:                                                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] No escaped quotes in the outer structure                                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Multi-line strings use \n not actual newlines                                                                                                     â”‚
